dct_description_sm: Index: Index ciuitatum quae in hoc theatro continentur.
First 2 and last 2 pages blank (included in page description).
Engraved title page, and head and tail-pieces throughout.
Decorative cartouches, coats of arms, seals, compass roses, ships, sea monsters.
Maps show bird's eye views of cities, including surrounding topography, waterways, and vegetation.
"Hieronymum Comitem a Rozrazeu Episcopum Vladislauiensem et Pomerania: Regni Poloniae Senatorem" on title page.
Descriptive text follows each map; descriptive text on some maps (e.g. Map 54).
Map 58 has index: Insigniorum urbis aedificiorum index.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
